additionalLossCondition.name: Irreparable Damage
additionalLossCondition.description: Track how many <blight> come off the Blight Card during Ravages that do 8+ Damage to the land. If that number ever exceeds players, the Invaders win.

steps.name: Ravage
steps.description: Track how many <blight> come off the Blight Card during Ravages that do 8+ Damage to the land. If that number ever exceeds players, the Invaders win.

escalation.name: Seek Prime Territory
escalation.description: {escalation}  After Exploring: On each board with 4 or fewer <blight>, add 1 <town> to a land without <town>/<blight>. On each board with 2 or fewer <blight>, do so again.

steps.name: After Build
steps.description: After the normal Build Step: In each land matching a Build Card, Gather 1 <town> from a land not matching a Build Card. (In board/land order.)
During Setup, on each board, add 1 <town> to land #2 and 1 <town> to the highest-numbered land without Setup symbols.

steps.name: Build
steps.description: During Play, when Invaders would Build 1 <city> in an Inland land, they instead Build 2 <town>.
When making the Invader Deck, Remove 1 additional Stage I Card. (New deck order: 11-2222-33333)

levels.name: Herds Thrive in Verdant Lands
levels.staticInformation: <town> in lands without <blight> are Durable: they have +2 Health, and 'Destroy <town>' effects instead deal 2 Damage (to those <town> only) per <town> they could Destroy. ('Destroy all <town>' works normally.)

levels.name: Wave of Immigration

steps.description: Before the initial Explore, put the Habsburg Reminder Card under the top 5 Invader Cards.

levels.staticInformation: When the Habsburg Reminder Card is Revealed, on each board, add 1 <city> to a Coastal land without <city> and 1 <town> to the 3 Inland lands with the fewest <blight>.

steps.name: Ravage
steps.description: Ravages do +2 Damage (total) if any adjacent lands have <town>. (This does not cause lands without Invaders to Ravage.)
